item.title: the Positioning of Stock Fundamentals
item.description:
According to Warren Buffet, buying a stock is like acquiring an ownership interest in the business for a company. Thus, for Buffet, stock fundamentals matter.

Do companies traded on the stock market have a positioing – a relative standing to each other in terms of the fundamentals (financials) – to determine performance? According to strategy researchers, the answer is YES.

  • This post is intended to serve three purposes:
      1. train a neural network to demostrate the predictive power of the fundamental-positionings on stock returns in the SH/SZ stock exchange.
      1. introduce a data base called “Tushare Pro” for the China mainland stock markets, crypto-currencies, and more. The data used for the analysis below is accessible through Tushare for free.
      1. if you are interested in Tushare data, your can register through https://tushare.pro/register?reg=366051, which will allow me to receive 50 points in community for enhanced data access. Thank You! (My research will benefit from the data!)
